pages.text: All composing materials can be dropped by any hostile entity.
Small crystals are used for Tier 1 composing, and can be combined into Medium crystals.
Medium crystals are used for Tier 2 composing, and can be combined into Large crystals.
Large crystals are used for Tier 3 and Tier 4 composing. Tier 4 composing has a 50% chance of success.
Blessing stones are used for Tier 1 and Tier 2 composing, and can be combined into Soul stones.
Soul stones are used for Tier 3 composing, and can be combined into Holy stones.
Holy stones are used for Tier 4 composing. Tier 4 composing has a 50% chance of success.
